title: 1940: That Gang Of Mine - East Side Kids

sources.title: 1940: That Gang Of Mine - East Side Kids
sources.description: A street kid has dreams of becoming a jockey. He gets his chance when he and his gang discover a poor old man who has a championship race horse. Cast Bobby Jordan ... Danny Dolan Leo Gorcey ... Muggs Maloney Clarence Muse ... Ben Dave O'Brien ... Knuckles Dolan Joyce Bryant ... Louise Ernest Morrison ... Scruno  Milton Kibbee ... Mr. Wilkes David Gorcey ... Peewee Donald Haines ... Skinny Richard Terry ... Henchman Blackie  Wilbur Mack ... Nick Buffalo Hazel Keener ... Mrs. Wilkes Eugene Francis ... Algernon 'Algy' Wilkes Victor Adamson ... Turf Club Extra  Forrest Taylor ... Horse Trainer Morgan  Nick Wall ... Jockey Jimmy Sullivan    Directed by Joseph H. Lewis Screenplay by William Lively Story by Alan Whitman Associate Producer Pete Mayer Producer Sam Katzman Cinematography by Robert E. Cline, Harvey Gould Set Decoration by Fred Preble Film Editing by Carl Pierson Assistant Director Arthur Hammond, Herman Pett Details Country USA Release Date: September 23, 1940 Production Co:  Four Bells Pictures, Monogram Pictures
